title: Everyone had an application form in his hand, but no one knew which office room _______.
tip: send it to which offic room

title: When I caught him ______ me, I stopped buying things there and started dealing with another shop.
tip: caught him cheating 发现他的欺诈行为

title: Helen was much kinder to her youngest brother than she was to the others, ___________, of course, made the others jealous.
tip: 引导的非限定语从句，对前句补充说明

title: “You are very selfish. It’s high time you _______ that you are not the most important person in the world,” Edgar said to his boss angrily.
chs: 你太自私了，是时候让你明白你不是这世界上最重要的人的道理，埃德加努气冲冲地向老板讲道。
tip: It's high time 形式主语

title: Had he worked harder in the last semester, he _____________ the exams.
This bottle is nearly empty; you _________ a lot.
chs: 瓶都要空了，你肯定喝了不少

title: You ____________ her in her office last Friday; she’s been out of town for two weeks.
It is generally considered unwise to give a child ___________he or she wants.
chs: 一般人认为，满足孩子所有的欲望是不明智的。
tip: 状语从句；=anything that

title: Only under special circumstances ________ to take make-up tests.
chs: 只有在特殊情况下，新生才能补考。
tip: only开头用倒装语序

title: The course normally attracts 20 students per year, _______ up to half will be from overseas.
chs: 这门课通常每年吸引20名学生参加，在他们中有半数以上来自海外。
tip: 指代of 20 students

title: Susan has been living in town for only one year, yet she seems to be ______with everyone who comes to the store.
chs: 苏三在镇上仅仅住了一年，却好像对来商店的每个人都非常熟悉。
tip: acquierd 取得；acquainted 熟知

title: It is announced that tourists can participate in excursions to lovely beaches around the island at regular______.
chs: 据宣布，游客可以到小岛周围的沙滩普通区域参加短途旅行。
tip: intervals 定期

title: It is widely accepted that if you suspect that the illness might be serious, you should not ______ going to the doctor.
chs: 普遍认为如果你怀疑这病很严重，你就不应该推迟去看医生。
tip: give off 发出；put off 推迟

title: Although he had looked through the reference material on the subject, he still found it hard to  understand this point and her explanation only ______ to his confusion.
chs: 尽管他查阅了所有相关资料，但他还是很难理解，而她的解释只能增加他的疑惑。
tip: amounted 相当于；added 增加

title: It is said a peculiarly pointed chin is his most memorable facial ______.
chs: 据说特别尖的下巴是他最显著的脸部特征。
tip: mark 标志；feature 特征；appearance 外貌；

title: Shanghai Bund is a great tourist ______, drawing millions of visitors worldwide every year.
chs: 上海外滩是一个非常吸引游客的地方，每年有上百万来自四面八方的游客。
tip: attention 注意力；attraction 吸引；

title: Over a third of the population was estimated to have no ______ to the health service, which ndraws the attention of our government.
chs: 估计三分之一的人口无法获得公共医疗卫生服务，引起了我们政府的注意。
tip: access to 获得；

title: When you travel abroad, tourists should remember that customers don't ______ about prices in some cities.
chs: 当你在国外旅行时，游客要记住在某些城市不能讨价还价。
tip: consulte 商议；dispute 争论；bargain 讨价还价；

title: The price of beer ______ from 50 cents to $4 per liter during the summer season.
chs: 夏季啤酒价格每升在50美分到4美元范围之间。
tip: ranged 从…到…的范围；separated 分开；

title: Many people complain of the rapid ______ of modern life.
chs: 许多人抱怨快节奏的现代生活。
tip: rate 速度；pace 步伐（抽象名词）；

title: None of the servants were ______ when Mr. Smith wanted to send a message.
chs: 当史密斯先生想要发消息时，仆人们都不在。
tip: available 有空的；applicable 可适用的；

title: He is ______ about his chances of winning a gold medal in the Olympics next year.
chs: 他对明年奥林匹克赢得金牌的机会保持乐观。
tip: optimistic 乐观的；outstanding 未解决的；

title: You should hire a more ______ manager than the one you currently have.
chs: 你应该雇佣一个比现在这位更有能力的经理。
tip: effective 有效的；efficient 有效率的，有能力的；

title: What ______ to him is whether the job allows him to pursue his studies?
chs: 对他重要的是这份工作是否允许他可以继续他的学业。
tip: matters 事项； refers 提到；

title: His lack of professional knowledge _______for the failure of the experiment.
chs: 他缺乏专业知识导致实验失败。
tip: accounted 导致；contributed 贡献；
